Instance Method# setCookies(_:completionHandler:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
@MainActor
func setCookies(
    _ cookies: [HTTPCookie],
    completionHandler: (@MainActor () -> Void)? = nil

```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/WebKit/WKHTTPCookieStore/setCookies(_:completionHandler:)#parameters)

`cookies`An array of cookies to set.

`completionHandler`A block to invoke once the cookies have been stored.

## [Discussion](/documentation/WebKit/WKHTTPCookieStore/setCookies(_:completionHandler:)#discussion)

Set multiple cookies.
